name: Remember When We Used to Play Hangman?
name_original: Remember When We Used to Play Hangman?
description:
3 years ago, your BF Yaku Zayusu suddenly just disappeared from your hometown. You've just finished your first semester of university in this new town and decided to take up a temporary job for 4 days at a nearby bowling alley only to meet him again working there. Is this just coincidence or fate? What happened to him during the past 3 years? How will your relationship with him be from now on?

Hangman is a visual novel that revolves around a long lost childhood best friend. To date or just be friends is up to you! Make sure to win his heart if you want a closer relationship with him! There are 3 different endings to explore with many variations of storyline based on your decisions and favorites!

This is a Beta Test! If you enjoy the game or have any feedback please consider taking this short survey to help improve the game or for future works. Bug reports are welcomed too! https://forms.gle/RgQicSXYRg5GpHj6A
